heading: HR00457
0: A RESOLUTION URGING THE DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH TO STRICTLY PROHIBIT POLITICAL DISCRIMINATION IN THE ADMISSION OF PATIENTS AND RENDERING OF HEALTH CARE SERVICES IN HOSPITALS, CLINICS AND ALL OTHER HEALTH FACILITIES
